items.title: US calls for international action to cut weapons supply to Sudan paramilitaries
items.description: "They're committing acts of sexual violence and atrocities," says the US secretary of state, "and it needs to end immediately".

items.title: Anthony Zurcher: Democrats left bruised after historic shutdown yields little
items.description: Trump emerges from the shutdown having made little in the way of substantive concessions to Democrats in Congress.

items.title: What we know about new Epstein emails that mention Trump
items.description: In emails released by Democrats, Epstein says Trump "knew about the girls". The White House says they are an attempt to "smear" the president.

items.title: Nigeria cancels mother-tongue teaching in primary schools and reverts to English
items.description: Exam results from areas which dropped English have declined, the education minister says, announcing the U-turn.

items.title: Epstein email says Andrew had photo taken with Virginia Giuffre
items.description: The message sent by Epstein reads: "Yes she [Giuffre] was on my plane and yes she had her picture taken with Andrew"
